title: Quince | SDE-3 | Offer | Bangalore
content:
Education: Mechanical Engineering from Tier-1 Institute
Years of Experience: 4.25
Prior Experience: MNC, B2B startup
Prior Compensation : 35L
Date of the Offer: Oct 2023
Company: Quince
Title/Level: SDE-3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: INR 40L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: None
ESOPs: $ 30000( approx INR 25L) vested over 5 years
Bonus: INR 4L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):INR 49L
Benefits: Standard benefits
Other details: Do not have any other offers. Impacted by layoffs at my current company, so couldn't negotiate much on this offer.

I was giving interviews for roles which had lesser budget than my current TC. This offer looks good to me based on my current situation and allows me to jump to SDE-3 role.

Should I accept it?

title: Unacademy || SE || Banglore
content:

title: Kotak | SDE2 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: BE from Tier-3 college
Years of Experience: 4
Prior Experience: SDE-2 at Big Tech
Current Salary: ~27LPA
Date of the Offer: October 2023
Company: Kotak
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: 32LPA
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: Performance-based bonus: 3LPA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 35LPA
Other details: Rejected the offer since very less increment and no benefits as such. If I consider benefits at my current company, that itself will account to around 3-4LPA cash before taxes. Also if anyone is working there or joined recently would like to know review of the company. I felt like there is a lot of pressure/workload there right now.
